text:
Hello guys
Can we add the HubSpot simple chat flow like banner section please check Link <https://leadoo.com/>
Thanks in advance
Is there a way using `hs fetch` to just pull new or changed files?
Hi Matt, just curious if you had come across anything on this? It seems to come and go; today I was working fine for a couple hours but now again the blank template returns :disappointed:

Hey Cory, not at this time. Could you elaborate on why you would like this functionality? Is it so you could pull down some remote changes (like a new file), but not overwrite some local changes you have made?
I haven’t been able to reproduce on this end
Could you grab a screenshot of the source the next time it happens?

I woudl love this so that when we havent worked in a folder for a while it would just overwrite the files that have changed instead of having to delete the folder ort overwrite the entire folder structure.
